title: Draven SFX bugs (Primetime skin)
body:
Draven seems to have a bug on his "Primetime" skin where his Q and ult has water like splash sounds that come from the Pool party draven
Although I do not own the skin(Pool Party) I am unable to test it but I noticed when I was in game the Q sounds and on the practice tool I noticed the ultimate was also bugged.
I should also mention the Q sfx bug is ONLY when his Q hits a target so when it's spinning in his hand or when he picks it up it's the normal sfx

replies.body: Hi! This should be resolved with the latest patch. If you're still hearing the incorrect sounds, please feel free to hit me up! :)
